item.title: LibraryThing.Rmd
item.description: For many years I used a web site called Shelfari to track my reading and wish list. This was eventually swallowed by Amazon and merged with Goodreads. For reasons I cannot remember now I did not like Goodreads and ended up switching to a service called LibraryThing that created a conversion process to get the Shelfari data in there. I havenâ€™t used it as faithfully as Shelfari and only recently started marking dates when I completed books.
